alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 7:55PM AKST until January 04 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...East winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Snow will blow into drifts and visibility may be reduced. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are occuring near Unalakleet.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
